topic: Combinatorial creativity techniques and their application in renewable energy innovation
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling my prompts will uncover new insights and patterns in my thinking, leading to creative solutions I hadn't considered. As a next step, I'll experiment with rearranging my existing prompts and document any new ideas or themes that emerge. I'll also explore tools or software that can facilitate this shuffling process to systematically analyze the outcomes.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
